tool_description: Data Protection and PII Detection API
name: Scramblr
title: Scramblr

api_list.name: /detect/text
api_list.description: Detect PII (personally identifiable information) entities and their position (span) in the submitted text. The type of each entity is also given.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scramblr.p.rapidapi.com/detect/text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scramblr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /redact/text
api_list.description: Redact PII (personally identifiable information) entities from the submitted text. PII entities are redacted by replacing them with a random sequence of '*'.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scramblr.p.rapidapi.com/redact/text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scramblr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

schema.description: Response containing text with PII entities redacted.

redactedText.description: The text with all PII entities redacted (replaced with a random sequence of '*').
